title: How to Cheat on the Game Motherload

steps.headline: Type in "Motherload Addicting Games".
steps.description: The cheats only work on that site.

steps.headline: Delete the first message from Mr.Natas.
Type in bling as many times as you want.
Buy the best upgrades (aluminium drill, etc).
steps.description: Buy 64 plastic explosives, 10 dynamite, 56 hull nanobots, 78 fuel things (if you run out of cash, go to options and repeat step 6).

text: Type in "Motherload Addicting Games". The cheats only work on that site. Click the, "PLAY NOW" button.  Delete the first message from Mr.Natas.  Fill up your fuel tank.  Click on "OPTIONS".  Type in bling as many times as you want.  Go into the junk shop.  Buy the best upgrades (aluminium drill, etc). Buy 64 plastic explosives, 10 dynamite, 56 hull nanobots, 78 fuel things (if you run out of cash, go to options and repeat step 6). Keep going down!
